titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cuprate(4-), Y2-YY3-YYsubstituted?-1,3,5-triazin- 2-yl?amino?-2-hydroxy-5-sulfophenyl?(substituted)azo?, sodium salt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Cuprate(4-), Y2-YY3-YYsubstituted?-1,3,5-triazin- 2-yl?amino?-2-hydroxy-5-sulfophenyl?(substituted)azo?, sodium salt.
